title: You want to get Married
header: So, you want to get married, do you?
abstract: At last! Some clear, biblically based, powerful teaching for those who desire to be married or are preparing for marriage. The overall divorce rate is the same in the church as it is in the world, about 50%. Pastor Tom exposes why this is so and how you can see to it that you do all you can to prepare yourself for marriage. This one is an absolute must for every person desiring to be married. A caution here: Some of this material may not be suitable for those under 18.
